channel.title: RuneVault Private Server - Join the team now!
channel.description:
Dear readers, Im the owner of runevault, a runescape based website. Over the past years, runevault was a help website, but now we want to take a different direction and open up a runescape private server. We need a team of people to help us be sucessful. So if you have experience with private servers. please post here giving some examples of your previous work, and we will add you to the team.
thanks for reading, i look forward to working with you all.

item.title: RuneVault Private Server - Join the team now!
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

[quote=“Songoty, post:3, topic:172234”]Read the Sticky.
No non serious Devolpment teams, or teams based around a website.
Oh, and dont just put “serious” in your forum topic name.[/quote]
Agreed

Read full topic
item.source: RuneVault Private Server - Join the team now!

item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

Yeah, seriously, I doubt anybody would go to you and just say “Hey, let me code your server!”

Atleast tell us your intentions (…About the Server!)

item.title: RuneVault Private Server - Join the team now!
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Would help if we knew what expericence you had, becasue no body is going to code’ this for you too host I really don’t think…

You need to learn soemthings first.

Also tell us more about what you are planning on doing if you know anything about Programming.

Read full topic
